post.title: ANYmal Autonomous Legged Robot from ETH zurich
post.description: ANYmal is a rugged, autonomous four-legged robot designed for inspection and manipulation tasks. It uses sensors to scan the terrain and avoid obstacles, and can operate in rain, snow, wind, waterlogged rooms, and dusty environments.
post.content: ANYmal is a rugged, autonomous four-legged robot designed for inspection and manipulation tasks. It uses sensors to scan the terrain and avoid obstacles, and can operate in rain, snow, wind, waterlogged rooms, and dusty environments.
